EmailTemplate.description: Validate an active subscription before transferring.
EmailTemplate.name: AC Sold/ MGT Change
EmailTemplate.subject: More information required AC SOLD /MGT CHANGE {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We received communication from a customer requesting to move aircraft with _____and tail _____ under their name. Please confirm that the AC has sold or the management company has changed.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Account Management Representative(AMR)
Honeywell Aerospace
Email: dsa@honeywell.com
Phone: 602-436-6739, Ext 3
Fax: 602-822-7333
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States, Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
{!EmailMessage.TextBody}
